node.category: What is the way things are?
Should we do anything about dog dirt?

node.surface: Dog dirt on the pavement requires my complete, ground-focused attention on my way to work.

node.category: What is the consequence of this?

node.surface: This results in a lack of alertness in the road traffic comparable to a minor offense of the traffic regulations.
That's why causing such obstacles must to be more urgently punished.

node.category: What would be an argument against punishing dog dirt?

node.surface: Dog owners may think that dog dirt is only a harmless secretion of an animal like any other.

node.category: Why is dog dirt not only a harmless secretion of an animal like any other?

node.surface: Yet then they misjudge its impact on road traffic.
